Class.name: Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.QDCValidation
Class.Description:
Report Name: QDC Extract Validation
Report Code: AUXX.EXT.QDCV
TRC Number: 158258

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)

XData.name: ReportDefinition
XData.Data:
<report xmlns='http://www.intersystems.com/zen/report/definition' queryClass='Custom.AUXX.Report.ZEN.StoredProc.QDCValidation' queryName='Validate' name='Validation'> <parameter expression='..DateFrom'/> <parameter expression='..DateTo'/> <parameter expression='..Facility'/> <parameter expression='..Speciality'/> <parameter expression='..Clinician'/> <parameter expression='..ConType'/> <parameter expression='..ErrorType'/> <attribute name='ReportTitle' expression='$$$Text("@QDCExtractValidation@QDC Extract Validation")'/> <attribute name='timestamp' expression='$ZDATETIME($H, 2, 2)'/> <attribute name='username' expression='..Username'/> <attribute name='facility' expression="..GetHospListDesc(..Facility)"/> <attribute name='speciality' expression="..GetSpecialtyListDesc(..Speciality)"/> <attribute name='clinician' expression="..GetCareProvListDesc(..Clinician)"/> <attribute name='contacttype' expression="..ConType"/> <attribute name='errortype' expression="..ErrorType"/> <attribute name="datefrom" expression="..DisplayDate(..DateFrom)"/> <attribute name="dateto" expression="..DisplayDate(..DateTo)"/>
<group name="displaytype" breakOnField="DisplayType"> <attribute name="displaytypedesc" field="DisplayType" /> <aggregate name='TotalErrors' type='SUM' field='Errors'/> <aggregate name='TotalWarnings' type='SUM' field='Warnings'/> <aggregate name='TotalContacts' type='CUSTOM' field='PAENQRowId' class='%ZEN.Report.Aggregate.CountDistinct'/> <group name="clinician" breakOnField="CareProv"> <attribute name="cliniciandesc" field="CareProv" /> <group name='Detail'> <attribute field='CareProv' name='CareProv'/> <attribute field='PatientNo' name='PatientNo'/> <attribute field='EpisodeNo' name='EpisodeNo'/> <attribute field='SLK' name='SLK'/> <attribute field='ContactName' name='ContactName'/> <attribute field='ErrorWarning' name='ErrorWarning'/> </group> </group> </group> </report>

XData.name: ReportDisplay
